title: How to Make Mango Mush

steps.headline: Put the apricot in a container or tupperware and pour the orange juice on the apricot.
Place the container in the refrigerator overnight.
Peel and cut the mango into slices.
steps.description: Clean out the mango while cutting by removing the flesh and pit.

steps.headline: Prepare the banana by cutting it into small diced pieces.
Use a food processor or blender to puree the banana, apricot, and mango slices together.
Thin it out with baby formula, if needed.

text: Put the apricot in a container or tupperware and pour the orange juice on the apricot.  Place the container in the refrigerator overnight.  Peel and cut the mango into slices. Clean out the mango while cutting by removing the flesh and pit. Prepare the banana by cutting it into small diced pieces.  Use a food processor or blender to puree the banana, apricot, and mango slices together.  Thin it out with baby formula, if needed.  Finished.
